pages.text: Some of the creatures of the $(thing)Aether$(), namely $(thing)Aechor Plants$() and $(thing)Cockatrice$(), bear a dangerous, intoxicating poison which causes the sufferer to lose control of their own movements. There's a couple of ways to cure this if one so desires.

pages.title: White Apples
pages.text: Scattered around on small islands are blue-leaved $(item)Crystal Trees$(). These trees bear a fruit knwon as $(item)White Apples$(). These apples are one of the known cures for intoxicating poison. Unfortunately, the $(thing)Crystal Trees$() are difficult, if not outright impossible, to cultivate.

pages.title: Collecting Poison
pages.text: The other cure is made from the refining of the source of the poison itself. To start, you'll need to use a $(item)Skyroot Bucket$() to collect poison from an $(thing)Aechor Plant$().

pages.heading: Remedy Buckets
pages.description: The $(item)Poison Bucket$() can then be purified in an $(item)Enchantment Altar$() to produce the $(item)Remedy$().
